projects.name: TUI RPG Visual Polish
projects.description: Add visual flair and polish to the TUI roguelike game - animations, effects, color schemes, and UI improvements

tasks.name: Combat Hit Flash Effects
tasks.details: Add brief visual feedback when entities take damage - flash the tile/character red or invert colors momentarily. Could use a simple frame-based animation system.

tasks.name: Floating Damage Numbers
tasks.details: Display damage numbers that briefly appear and fade/rise when damage is dealt. Numbers could be colored by damage type (red for physical, blue for psy, green for healing).

tasks.name: Status Effect Visual Indicators
tasks.details: Show visual cues on affected entities - burning enemies flicker orange/red, poisoned entities pulse green, frozen entities shown in cyan. Could modify the entity's color or add a small indicator.

tasks.name: Projectile Trail Animation
tasks.details: Animate ranged attacks with a brief projectile trail from attacker to target. Could show characters like '-', '/', '*' moving across tiles for arrows/bolts/spells.

tasks.name: Smooth Camera/Viewport Transitions
tasks.details: When the viewport needs to shift (player near edge), animate the transition smoothly over a few frames rather than snapping instantly.

tasks.name: Environmental Ambient Animations
tasks.details: Add subtle ambient movement - water tiles shimmer/ripple, torches flicker, grass sways. Use cycling characters or color shifts on specific tile types.

tasks.name: Color Theme System
tasks.details: Create a configurable color palette system allowing different themes (classic green terminal, warm dungeon, cold ice cave, etc). Store colors in a theme struct that UI modules reference.

tasks.name: Health Bar Styling
tasks.details: Improve health/psy bars with gradient colors (green->yellow->red as health drops), add Unicode block characters for smoother bars, optional pulsing when low.

tasks.name: Message Log Enhancements
tasks.details: Color-code message types (combat red, loot gold, system gray), add timestamps or turn numbers, fade older messages to dimmer colors.

tasks.name: Death/Game Over Screen Polish
tasks.details: Enhance the death screen with dramatic presentation - screen fade to red, ASCII art skull or tombstone, stats summary with animation, dramatic text reveal.
